title: Dollars or decay
creator_credit: Department of Health Services and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Illustrates the consequences that a poor or bad diet has on teeth. Attention is especially drawn to food served in school tuckshops. Section on good nutrition habits and how to give children low cost healthy food that they like.
creator_credit_for_label: Department of Health Services and Tasmanian Film Corporation
